item.title: About
item.description: I’m a MSc student in Computer Science at UNICAMP that loves programming and solving problems. I graduated in Computer Engineering from the same university. I’m currently researching in compiler construction and code optimization. I’m also interested in computer architecture, HPC systems and parallel computing. Previously, I worked as a Intern at the Brazilian Center for Research in Energy and Materials (CNPEM), into the Brazilian Synchrotron Light Laboratory (LNLS) / Sirius, on the Scientific Computing Group (GCC).
